title: Summer vegetable couscous salad
ingredients: ['120ml boiling water', '1 tablespoon butter', 'pinch salt', '100g couscous', '2 ripe tomatoes, diced', '1 cucumber, diced', '100g salad greens', '1 bunch spring onions, finely sliced', '1 bunch fresh parsley, finely chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 clove of garlic, crushed']
